name: (R) Ref. Case ASHP FS (Other Fossil Furnace)
_description: ENERGY STAR air source heat pump (w/ cold climates specs as applicable) fully replacing original fuel oil/propane equipment

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Typical value for performance, converted to Scout units where necessary.
energy_efficiency_source.source_data: Buildings Annual Technology Baseline. NREL, forthcoming

installed_cost_source.notes: Buildings Technology Baseline using Typical performance value to calculate cost. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ysu2kIZFN7CjvWRmEKRgoEc2bL0KuN2w53YBy9ijKKA/edit?gid=0#gid=0
installed_cost_source.source_data: Buildings Annual Technology Baseline. NREL, forthcoming

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies: Appendix A
source_data.author: U.S. Energy Information Admnistration

market_scaling_fractions_source.notes: Heating multiples were determined as proportion of total homes with non-NG fossil-based heating that have both cooling and heating systems in each BA climate zone. Cooling multiple of 8% was determined as a proportion of total homes with a cooling system (16,171 homes) where there is heating via a heating energy source other than natural gas, electricity, or biomass AND heating is done via non:steam/hot water system (1,338 homes).
